body.p: provides a graphical schema design editor to make editing XML Schema easier. To configure the Schema Design options, and go to Editor Edit modes Schema Design .
The following options are available in the Schema Design preferences page:

dlentry.dd: When selected, displays the content of xs:documentation elements in schema diagrams.

dt.uicontrol: When trying to edit components from another schema

dlentry.dd:
The schema diagram editor will combine schemas imported by the current schema file into a single schema diagram. You can choose what happens if you try to edit a component from an imported schema. The options are:
Always go to its definition - opens the imported schema file so that you can edit it.
Never go to its definition - The imported schema file is not opened and the component cannot be edited in place.
Always ask - asks if you want to open the imported schema file.
Allows you to set the default zoom level of the schema diagram.
